descriptionHTML:
Cool and simplistic design for your watch face. Looks very elegant on moto360, lg g watch r , urbane, samsung gear live,zen watch...

Shows seconds with an elegant blue coloured arc that spins around the time. Designed for simplistic watches and elegant watch face lovers.

Perfect for your smart watch.

Key features :

• Simple watch face
• Very low battery usage!
• Seconds display!
• Supports round and square faces
• Combination of Analog and digital clock watch
• Quick Visibility!

Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :
• Motorola 360
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• Samsung Gear Live
• Sony Smartwatch 3
• ASUS ZenWatch

To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Simplistic Watch Face as your watch face
comments: Loved the watch face. But only 2 requests..  1. An option to make the background black for oled screens( I have a zenwatch 2nd gen. And black background will hide the bezels.) 2. An ambient mode  Rest.. its awesomeüëç
great watchface, looks nice and neat great watchface, looks nice and neat
Love the watch face looks really neat
